subject: Attention Dear Friend
body:
Attention Dear Friend
I received your mail and the content well understood,I am exercising great discretion so as not  to fall into wrong hands. I would need personal assurance from you that you are going to be fair,co-operative and straight, forward with me. What I really need is tested and competent associate please you have to follow our instructions accordingly, I pray that I find such a person in you.
Following before we commence to your request, We need to relate each other in this Financial Assistance.Hence i could be able to understand and recognized that i am dealing with Human Being.For onward communication after which i shall connect you direct to the deposited bank.
Send the bellow information's for the take off the project.
Full Name:
Occupation:
Residential Address:
Country/State:
Company Name:
Company business address:
Company Webb site:
Company Profile/Project
Fax Number:
Mobile Number:
If you are comfortable with this my short briefing,our company address and phone number will be giving to you with our company website to avoid failing into wrong hands
, in which i will link you directly to the paying (Bank) for immediate processing and conclusion for the approval of the Fund.
Waiting your swift response
Best Regards,
 
Mr. Dudley Carvell
Chief Head-International Operations (CHIO)

subject: Re: Attention Dear Friend
body:
Dear Mr. Dudley Carvell,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your trust and discretion in sharing this information with me. I assure you that I am a reliable and trustworthy individual.

Before we proceed further, could you please provide me with more details about the project? I would like to understand the nature of the work and how I can be of assistance. Additionally, could you let me know which country and state this project is based in?

Furthermore, it would be helpful if you could share your company profile with me so that I can have a better understanding of your organization. This will also help establish a level of credibility between us.

Once I have these details, I will be able to assess how best to proceed and assist you with your request. Please provide me with your company address, phone number, and website as well.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Gwendolyn
